english.segment2: I wanna set the world on fire. Until it's burning bright for You. It's everything that I desire. Can I be the one You use?
english.segment3: [CHORUS]. I, I am small but. You, You are big enough. I, I am weak but. You, You are strong enough to. Take my dreams. Come and give them wings. Lord with You. Nothing I can not do. Nothing I cannot do
english.segment4: I wanna feed the hungry children. And reach across the farthest land. And tell the broken there is healing. And mercy in the Father's hands
english.segment6: Take my dreams. Come and give them wings. Lord with You. Nothing I cannot do. Nothing I cannot do
english.segment7: My hands my feet. My everything. My life, my love. Lord, use me
english.segment8: I wanna set the world on fire. I wanna set the world on fire, yeah
english.segment9: Take my dreams. Come and give them wings. Lord with You. Nothing I cannot do. Take my dreams. Come and give them wings. Lord with You. There's nothing I can't do. Nothing I can't do
english.segment10: I'm gonna set the world on fire. Set the world on fire
english.segment13: Set The World On Fire Ringtone Send "Set The World On Fire" Ringtone to your Cell Set The World On Fire Ringtone.
